description: July 1, 1956 7,441 Sedan Delivery Wagons were produced, making this a hard to find  model in todays market.  This lemon yellow sedan delivery wagon has had a ground up restoration and remains in very good condition.  It is processed by a 383 cu in engine in a V-8  with a 350 transmission. power steering power brakes chrome & paint are in excellent condition,   Automatic shifter on the floor, pioneer radio cassette am/fm stereo.  A/C and heat.  Mileage is exempt.
title: 1956 Chevrolet Bel Air

description: This beautiful 56 Bel Air 2 door has undergone a frame off restoration with many upgrades, painted a stunning Emerald Green & Cream 2 tone base coat clear coat sanded and wheeled, has new front and rear bumpers, new grill and grill molding, new parking lights and housings, new hood bird, new tail lights and housing, new door handles, new emblems, new side stainless - all other stainless is original and has been re-polished, new tinted windshield and rubber, new tinted side glass, rear window is original in good condition, new weather stripping and felts.

Complete new factory type black and white interior, dash has new trim, nicely updated with Classic Instrumentation gauge package, AM/FM/Cassette stereo with pair of 6x9 speakers mounting in package tray, Ididit billet tilt column with billet steering wheel, Classic AutoAir - air and heat unit with vents nicely mounted under dash, updated with electric wipers, billet LoKar gas pedal, new American Auto wiring harness thru out, new headliner, new door panels with new handles, new seat covers, outfitted with front seat belts, new carpet, new sill plates, Hurst 4 speed shifter with white ball, trunk has also been nicely updated with carpet and tire cover.

Under the hood we have a new GM crate 350 with Edelbrock aluminum intake, Edelbrock carb, electronic ignition, 100 amp 1 wire alternator, chrome pulleys, set of Sanderson cast iron headers into 2 1/2 inch exhaust out the back with chrome tips, updated with power steering, 605 gear box, Classic Auto air condition, heavy duty radiator with shroud, auxiliary electric fan, aluminum Chevrolet valve covers and breather, updated with power front disc brakes with drilled, slotted rotors and 2 inch drop spindles, drums on rear, Super T10 4 speed trans with Hurst shifter, new front suspension, front sway bar, new fuel tank and sending unit, new rear springs, stock rear end which has been outfitted with Auburn posi and 373 gear, Moser axles.
Rides on set of Boyd Coddington billet wheels 15x7 front and 15x8 rear with 225/70 all around.
Factory jack and spare. Everything on this car works as it should. Runs and drives excellent. Ready to Show & Cruise.
title: 1956 Chevrolet Bel Air

title: 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air

description: The year is 1957.  The Fabulous 50's are in full affect.  Our cars are huge, and it seems like something new and cool is coming out every time you turn around.  Elvis was at the top of the charts with All Shook Up, and you could even see him at your local Drive In (for all the much younger generation......google what those were) in Jailhouse Rock.  Things were rockn and rolln and people were having the time of their lives, and showing off their rides.      Just Toys Classic Cars is proud to present this amazing machine.  Before you is a 1 owner 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air.  That's right, a 1 owner survivor.  These are getting harder and harder to find.  The fit on this car is original from 1957 as it has never been restored.  The finish is what it is.  As you will see in some of the pics, there are some nicks and chips here and there, but over all, this paint presents very very well for being 59 years old.  As we always say here at JTCC we are known for our quality and our brutal honesty.  We show you what it is and let you judge for yourself.  We don't pull any punches.  That being said, this is very much a car that needs to be in your collection today.  Restore it, maybe....personally, we would leave it the way that it is, because as they say, they are only original once.    The interior of this time capsule is beautiful as well.  You will find one wear mark on the drivers side down by the bottom cushion and that is it.  Again, for 59 years old, this whole car presents itself very well.  The miles that you see on the odometer are original to the car.  Again, it has never been restored.    Under the hood of this beauty sits the original 283 that it was born with.  Some very cool features that this car was ordered with were power steering, power brakes, and even back up lights.  Yes, those were an option that you could pay for back in the day, everything was an option.  The 283 is mated to a powerglide transmission.  This allowed you to cruise in style with power steering, power brakes, and automatic.  Put it in drive, throw your arm around your sweetie, and go cruisn down the boulevard.    So, get this beautiful car, and go back to a simpler time, and remember the good old days.  We offer classic car financing for those that are wanting to take advantage of the option.  They offer great rates and terms with as little as 10% down, and you can pay it off without any prepayment penalties.  We look forward to speaking with you soon, and we look forward to making you the newest member of the Just Toys Classic Cars family. DISCLAIMER:    Before you buy any vehicle, sight unseen,  it is very important to ask as many questions as possible to make sure you are getting what you expect.  The majority of the customers that buy vehicles from us are very happy with their purchases.  We recommend that you should inspect cars in person before or have a professional appraisal company of your choice evaluate this vehicle and provide documentation to you at your expens
title: 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air

title: 1956 Chevrolet Bel Air

description: It's no secret that we love 1957 Chevys here at Streetside Classics, but the way they sell also proves that you love them too! With timeless looks and the ability to become just about anything you can imagine, there are few better choices for your next car than this lovely 1957 Bel Air 2-door post coupe.

The color is called really the only one that always looks great on a '57 Chevy: Matador Red. Thanks to a comprehensive restoration several years ago, it was given a full body makeover that included smoothing every parking lot ding it ever acquired, straightening every panel, and making sure that the two-stage urethane paint had a mile-deep shine. A close examination will reveal the usual signs of use and age, but that only proves that the car is working as intended and from five feet away it still looks fantastic. The high-visibility finish suits the '57 just fine, because you don't buy a 1957 Chevy of any kind if you want to keep a low profile. And you already know that chrome isn't cheap and the '57 is literally covered in the stuff, so you're in luck here because it's all in good shape. The side trim could be polished to a chrome-like shine and the emblems could be upgraded, but there aren't many complaints here!

The interior is as subtle as the exterior is flashy. With factory-looking cloth and vinyl upholstery on the original bench seats, they didn't stray too far from the original recipe, giving it that familiar funky look that '57s have. Black carpets prevent red overload, but it does have red floor mats to add a little brightness. Factory gauges are joined by a trio of aftermarket dials underneath, so the original loo prevails but you get a lot more information about the engine's condition. And yes, that's a Hurst 4-speed poking out of the floor. A modern AM/FM/cassette stereo head unit slots neatly into the dash for a little entertainment while you're cruising, but the dash keeps its flashy 1950s look. The trunk is tidy, too, with a correct rubber and a custom cover for the spare tire.

Small block Chevy power is a given in a '57 like this, and it's obvious that with 327 cubic inches on tap, not only was it built to drive, but that someone intended for this one to run as great as it looks. The usual stuff like a 4-barrel carb and polished Edelbrock intake manifold helps it build power and like all small block Chevys, it loves to rev and feels like it could pull forever. Other upgrades include front disc brakes with a new dual reservoir master cylinder and power brake booster, an alternator, and an Optima battery. The engine bay is tidy and the chassis shows off what you get when you start with a car from down south: a little surface scale but no critical rust issues. A new Flowmaster exhaust system sounds great and there's a fresh gas tank hanging out back to improve reliability. Cool REV aluminum wheels look like vintage Torque Thrusts and wear modern 225/40/18 front and 245/40/20 rear performance radial
title: 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air

This build includes a White electric fan to keep everything cool in traffic, it won't overheat. The original factory dash is updated with a custom gauge cluster so you can easily read everything and rely on the guages. title: 1955 Chevrolet Bel Air

description: Straight, rust free Southern California car is in excellent condition that is ready to be enjoyed. This are no excuses with this car featuring a strong 283 CID V8, automatic transmission, dual exhaust,  and power steering that is has been completely serviced. Equipped with new wheels and tires in addition to a front anti-sway bar the driving manners of the Bel Air are smooth, tight.    The paint condition is very good, its smooth and shows a strong shine. The chrome and bright work are also in very good condition without pitting or dings.   The impressions you come away with after driving this car is of smoothness of both power delivery and suspension compliance. The doors shut with a bank vault like clunk and solidity.   The engine starts easily with no smoking or fluid leaks, the dash gauges all work with the exception of the engine temperature gauge. There is a working supplemental gauge panel below the dash board with engine water temperature, voltage and oil pressure.   The glass and rubber are in very good condition, there are no cracks or separating glass. The rubber trim is soft and fresh.   The interior trim and upholstery are all in good condition showing little wear. The seats, headliner, and carpet are also in good condition with no tears or excess wear.   This is a turn key, ready to enjoy car that needs nothing. It is easy to own, drive and service.   This car is consigned by a motivated seller.  World wide delivery and independent inspection services are available. Financing is available with approved credit.

description: 1957 Chevy BelAir
Â
Â

Here is a stunning example of a detailed frame of restoration and the end result is absolutely breath taking! The body in incredibly straight having super smooth contours and CRISP body lines! ALL of the chrome line up NICE from panel to panel.Â The doors shut with confidence to reveal nice panel gaps. The doors shut as they should with no issues. The hood and trunk do the same. The bumpers shine true and bright! All of the trim has been polished and looks super good as well! The glass is in really good condition and is nice and clear! The paint that was laid down was done very well and has been maintained to a high standard! SHOW QUALITY! It will reflect anything put in front of it with no issues. The 2 paint colors complement each other SO well and create a contrast that is unmatched. We purchased this car locally and I never really had a chance to look at it until I pictured it. It is the NICEST 57 I HAVE EVER LAID MY EYES ON! It is so clean, true, beautiful, captivating, and well put together it is hard to find adjectives to describe it! EVERYTHING has been ran through, SO much is custom! The 3in drop that comes via coilovers in ALL 4 corners adds a nice stance that is aggressive and graceful at the same time! This timeless American classic looks 100% better now than when it came off the showroom! It is really hard to take all of this car in at one time so I will break it up for you! It looks beautiful in any light, any angle you want to take it in at!Â

The engine bay is SO clean and bright that it blinds you when you pop the hood! There is SO MUCH chrome and aluminum it is mind blowing! From brake booster to master cylinder, valve covers, breathers, alternator, radiator, and pulleyâ€™s just to name a few! The paint in this bay is just as detailed as the exterior! Nothing was skipped under this hood! Braided lines and a cleaned up firewall cant hurt anything either! SO MUCH DETAIL and once again SHOW QUALITY!
It breaths through custom exhaust and ceramic coated headers. I will tell you the exhaust tone is beautiful and only gets better as you smash the gas!

The interior is FULL custom, over 20k invested and wrapped in real leather! The front split bench seat is fully adjustable and looks to have never been sat on! The rear is wrapped in the same two tone that creates an incredible contrast of colors that will make you fall in love! The door panels have been covered in the same material, with billet hardware, power windows and it really brings the car together well! The headliner is new and super tight with NO STAINS. The carpet is new as well and free of stains or rips. The exterior paint quality has been brought inside and looks super nice on the dash and doors as well! In this beautifully detailed and painted dash rests a Digital dash with LED red lights! It is surrounded by a custom billet shroud! Nothing was left untouched! It even has billet pedals! The steering Ididit column is tiltÂ and with the combination of the adjustable front seat it will accommodate drivers of ALL SIZES! The trunk is incredible as well and SO CLEAN! It has a custom cut trunk lid inserts and is finished out just as nice as the interior!

The car starts, runs and drives like a DREAM! The 383 pulls extremely well through EVERY gear and the 400 transmission shifts with no issue what so ever! It rides super smooth and feels great through the turns. The car slows down and stops very well and straight thanks to the new 4 wheel disc conversion! It is ready to drive and drop jaws and will keep you cool with ICE COLD AC! Make sure you look at ALL pictures as the underside of this car is done almost as nice as the top!Â NO WORK NEEDED here! Just jump in and go!

title: 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air

description: Just Toys Classic Cars is your one stop shop for all of your cool Tri Chevy stuff and this car is no exception.  Before you is a 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air in Midnight Blue and man is she a beauty.  This is a great car that has had a lot of love and care put in to it and you could drive it anywhere.  As you can see, the fit and finish are in great shape.  The paint was done about 5 years ago and presents very well.  The chrome is so bright you need shades inside to look at it.  Really, you could shave in this chrome.  The 57 Chevy's were the pinnacle of the Tri Chevy's and still one of the most sought after to this day.  This is truly one of those cars that you get in, hit the key, and go have fun.    So, as we roll around to the interior, you will see the custom silver and blue combination that goes along with the beautiful outside blue color.  There are no rips or tears in the seats, door panels or headliner.  Again, this car has been very well cared for.  You will see the center console that has the AM/FM/CD in it plus some nice cup holders for your favorite beverage as you cruise the boulevard.  Everything in this car is very comfortable, and very easy to reach or read.  This may not be your new lexus, but this car is extremely comfortable to get in and drive for hours on end.    Under the hood sits a 350 that is putting out about 300 ponies and looks beautiful under the hood.  You are also going to see power steering, power front disc brakes, and the all important A/C so you can drive this beauty around on the hottest of days in comfort.  All of this is mated to a Turbo 400 automatic transmission that all leads out to a posi trac rear end.  Rear gears are unknown, but we can tell you that this car cruises like it should.  No steep drag race gears here on this one.    The bottom side of this car is as clean as the top.  As you will see in the pics we can just not say enough how well this car has been taken care of.  There has been new wiring put in, new aluminum radiator, and a whole lot of love and TLC.  This is the car that needs to be in your garage today.    We offer classic car financing for those that would like to take advantage of the offer.  They offer great rates and terms with as little as 10% down and no prepayment penalties.  This way you can get the car of your dreams without having to take all of the cash out of the bank at once and pay it off when you want to.  We look forward to speaking with you soon, and we look forward to making you the newest member of the Just Toys Classic Cars family.
